detect.description:
This device will query our on-site service to detect and retrieve the necessary information.
If you encounter a problem or want to add another device, you can enter it manually.
detect.label: Pair this device
detect.unreachable: You must be connected to the Poulailler Wi-Fi network to detect this device.

onFetchDeviceInfo.tooManyAttempts: Device not found on the network by our service after multiple attempts. (TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_AGAINST_PROBE)
onFetchDeviceInfo.unavailable:
Service unreachable.
Make sure you are connected to the Poulailler Wi-Fi network.

onVerifyDevice.tooManyAttempts: Device not found after multiple attempts. (TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_AGAINST_TICKETS)

delete.description:
Are you sure you want to delete this device?
This will not delete its related activity.
delete.title: Delete device

macAddress.label: MAC address
macAddress.locallyAdministered: This address is virtual and may change frequently. You might need to enter it again.

empty.description: To have your presence counted when you're on site, at least one device must be linked to your profile.
empty.title: No device linked

onFetch.fail: Unable to retrieve the device list
onFetch.missingId: Unable to retrieve the device identifier
